content: How to be FHIR compliant on Formulary Drug using the examples provided in HL7 davinici formulary guide. http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-drug-formulary/qa.html shows issues in the latest version.
Best to post formulary questions in #Da Vinci PDex Drug Formulary. But when you do please expand your question. What specific issues are you running into?
